about_the_game:
Get to galaxies you've never seen before in the main game! Jump into new stories with all sorts of levels and try experimental features in orb overload! All this and at the same time you'll be showing your love and support for Orb Overload!

What do you get?:
  • Get access to a solar system full of new levels!
  • Make levels with all the golden planet features!
  • Use Beta items before they are available for the whole group!
  • Be able to play new expansion levels as soon as they come out!

Have Fun in far away space!!

name: Orb Overload - VIP pack

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: same as main game
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: same as main game
  • DirectX: Version 9.0
  • Storage: 1 GB available space

dejus.descriptors:

Atos criminosos
Linguagem imprópria

short_description: Dive deeper into the world of Orb Overload with the V.I.P. Pack! A pack full of luxury and extra's no one else will be able to get for free!
